seo.title: Website That Works — Strategy, Copy, SEO & Tracking for €3,000 | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: All-inclusive website package for small businesses: strategy, professional copywriting, SEO foundations and GA4 tracking — €3,000 fixed price. We build websites that generate enquiries, not just exist online.

content.eyebrow: Metis Web Agency — All-Inclusive Website Package
content.title: A website that generates enquiries — not just looks good
content.subtitle: Strategy + professional copy + SEO + tracking. All included. €3,000.
content.body:
We build websites for small businesses that need more than a template. Strategy, professional copywriting, technical SEO and conversion tracking — in one package, at one price.

No hidden costs. No DIY copy. No guessing if it works.

content.title: Your website should be your best salesperson. Is it?

columns.subtitle: Most small business websites fail because:
columns.description: The message is unclear — visitors don't understand what you do in 10 seconds.</br></br>There's no strategy behind it — pages were added randomly, without a plan.</br></br>Nobody tracks anything — so you can't tell if the site is working or not.

columns.subtitle: We fix this with one focused package:
columns.description:
Goals & positioning — so every page has a purpose.

Professional copy — so visitors understand and act.

SEO & tracking — so you get found and know what works.

header.title: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
header.subtitle: 6 deliverables, all included in one fixed price.

items.title: Goals & priorities
items.description: We define what the site must achieve and what is unnecessary.

items.title: Target & message
items.description: Who you're reaching and what they must understand in 10 seconds.

items.title: Site structure
items.description: Essential pages, clear paths, coherent CTAs. No bloat.

items.title: Professional copy
items.description: We write everything. Text that explains, differentiates and converts.

items.title: SEO & performance
items.description: Technical foundations to get found on Google and AI search.

items.title: Measurement setup
items.description: GA4 + GTM with essential events. Know if it's working from week one.

content.title: Built with this method
content.subtitle: Different industries, same approach: goals first, then structure, copy and tracking.

content.title: We're not a 'full-service agency'. We do one thing well.
content.body: We don't sell social media management, branding workshops or 'digital transformation'. We build websites that work — with strategy, professional copy, solid SEO and clean tracking. That's it.</br></br>We work remotely with small businesses across Europe. English and French. One person manages your project from start to finish — no account managers, no handoffs, no surprises.

content.title: Book a free 30-minute call
content.subtitle: No pitch, no pressure. We'll listen and tell you if this is right for you.
content.description: If it's a fit, you'll receive a clear proposal within 48 hours.</br>If it's not, we'll tell you honestly.
